text: Egh kɨ kamaghɨra damuvɨra mangɨ mɨdorozir ekiaba ko, dagheba puvatɨghamin dughiaba ko arɨmariar kurabar amutɨ, da me bativɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bizir kurar kɨ Judaba me damuasa mɨkemezibar akam baregh, bar dɨgavir kuram damigh atiatingam. Egh kɨ Judaba batueghtɨ me tintinibar mangegham. Eghtɨ kantrin igharazir kabar gumazamiziba pazɨ me damuva, dɨbovir akabar me mɨkɨmam. Egh gumazamizir kaba uari uan apaniba akar kurabar me mɨkɨmsɨva, kamaghɨn me mɨkɨmam, ‘Ia Judaba ikuvizɨ moghɨn, ia ikuvigham.’
